chapter.title: Pairing Functions
chapter.para: An application will most likely need to instantiate a bilinear pairing before performing any other PBC operations.

Parameters for various pairings are bundled with PBC and should be suitable for cryptographic use. Most programs will probably want to start by initializing a pairing by reading a set of pairing parameters.
Particular instantiations of bilinear pairings are stored in the data type pairing_t. Functions that operate on them start with pairing_.
